name: Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater
name_original: Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater
description: Discover the origin story of iconic military operative Snake and begin to unravel the plot of the legendary Metal Gear series. Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater brings unprecedented new graphics, immersive stealth action gameplay and sounds to its riveting story as players once again return to the world of Metal Gear.
